name: Fly For Coins
description:
Fly over the skies in different scenarios to collect coins and reach new stages.

Show to your friends who is the best pilot.

Just be careful with the obstacles in the way.

Stage 1 - 100 points to win
Stage 2 - 1000 points to win
Stage 3 - 2000 points to win
Stage 4 - 3000 points to win
Stage 5 - 4000 points to win
